keyword: how many calories in a four loko
title: How Many Calories in a Four Loko?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Four Loko, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrients from this 23.5 oz can, plus variations and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories in a Four Loko?
assumptions: Standard 23.5 fl oz (695 ml) can, fruit punch flavor; values averaged across common flavors; alcohol content ~12-14% ABV.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, size, and serving; alcoholic beverages' calories include alcohol contribution. Consume responsibly; check labels.

quick_answer.text: A standard Four Loko can contains about 660 kcal, mostly from carbs and alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to a lower-sugar flavor like sour apple
Opt for the 16 oz slim can version

faqs.q: How many calories in a Four Loko can?
faqs.a: Approximately 660 kcal for a standard 23.5 oz can.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Four Loko?
faqs.a: About 81 g carbs, including 72 g sugars, per can.

faqs.q: Does Four Loko have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come from carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Four Loko?
faqs.a: Flavors vary slightly; fruit punch is around 660 kcal, while some like gold are lower at ~500 kcal.

faqs.q: Is there sodium in Four Loko?
faqs.a: Low sodium, about 20 mg per can, but check specific flavor labels.
